Index.title: Hi there, I'm <name>Rodrigo Cortezi</name> ðŸ‘‹

about.paragraph1: I am a Software Engineer with a true passion for developing comprehensive solutions, combining Full-Stack development and an entrepreneurial mindset to bring meaningful innovations to life. Over the last 5 years, I have led significant initiatives, including the expansion of the product catalog at Hurb and the successful launch of PartiuIngresso, a ticket marketplace.
about.paragraph2: I am always in search of challenges that allow me to explore new technologies and contribute to the development of products that make a difference.

hurb.description: Contributed to the development of a key software integration at Hurb, effectively expanding the activities product catalog by over 200%. This significant increase in offerings substantially enhanced user choice and business scalability.

clarific.description: Provided software solutions consulting to small businesses, leading to the development of over 4 key software products. This role involved understanding unique business needs, designing tailored solutions, and successfully implementing these technologies to drive growth and efficiency.

partiuingresso.description: Independently developed the PartiuIngresso platform, a dynamic ticket marketplace that achieved more then R$1 million in ticket sales and served more than 8,000 customers, enabling seamless access to shows and events.

Index.contact: You can check out some of my projects on <github></github>, or reach out to me on <linkedin></linkedin>. Or if you like, you can send me an <email></email>.
